alert.note: Alert for Cheshire (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 4:18PM EDT until July 12 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cheshire County in southern New Hampshire... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 417 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Walpole, or 17 miles northwest of Keene, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Keene, Peterborough, Antrim, Dublin, Harrisville, Nelson, Gilsum, Marlborough, Marlow, Roxbury, Walpole, Sullivan, Alstead, Westmoreland, Swanzey, Surry, Chesterfield, Hancock and Langdon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
